name: User
description: Store authentication details for each user

name: Recurring Plan
description: Stores information about a purchase plan

name: Sales Stage
description: Configuration records that mark a prospects level of engagement with your sales team.

name: Sales Team
description: Records information about the department responsible for meeting the sales goals of your organization.

name: Contact
description: Stores information about an individual person, or an organization.

name: Group
description: Stores information of the access groups.

name: Module
description: Store information of tenant's installed apps.
